author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-845: added lucene-grouping module to the embedded solr dependencies of o.a.s.commons.solr.core

author: gnodet
msg: [ARIES-986] Make sure the extender receives all stopping events, even if still in the initial tracking phase, avoid some processing in the container when it is stopping, stop containers when the proxy manager has been lost. Add additional checks before creating the container

author: gnodet
msg: [ARIES-991] Concurrency issue which can cause a service to be kept registered

author: luca
msg: Changes to improve DataSourceCatalog back-end for File Manager: support of lenient validation layer, and of "product_id" column of type string (OODT-541 and OODT-544).
